attributes.action: Leadsom to redraw her comments about men shouldn't be hired to do childcare
attributes.background:
Following the independent news article, i find myself upset about Leadsom comments about men in childcare.
Not all men are paedophiles and for one i do a fantastic job to support children develop to there needs within the early years of their lifes 

I feel let do by her stereo typical comments.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Andrea Leadsom, not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
